description:
This course will highlight one of the most Important and Critical Processes being used in IT Industry. You will learn how this process will reduce no. of outages, financial losses and negative Business Impact to any Industry.

I have explained all of the steps in Plain English by using simplest of techniques to make you understand the impact that this Analysis bring.

If you have desire to improve performance of any Business or looking for expansion then this course is MUST for you.

This course will have great transformation in you. You will get good Business understanding, visibility of various processes and will become more Responsible engineer or technician

I have over 1100+ satisfied students who have enrolled in my other courses- So you will not be disappointed at any stage. Of course there is 30 days Money back guarantee without a question.

If you have any doubt- you can always send me message or drop an email - I will try my best to answer you asap.
title: Root Cause Analysis in IT Infrastructure
